DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study attenuate systemic inflammatory response Endovascular repair abdominal aortic aneurysm , administration single preoperative dosage Methylprednisolone .
DOC.criteria: Elective endovascular repair asymptomatic abdominal aortic aneurysm . Informed sign consent Positive HIV status , positive hepatitis B C status Immunoinflammatory disease except topically treat skin disease respiratory disease . Glaucoma Gastric duodenal ulcer Systemic fungal infection Immunosuppressive treatment Current treatment cancer Allergy towards content SoluMedrol Alcohol consumption : Men > 21 drink woman > 14 drink weekly Pregnancy Lack inform signed consent Patients follow plan location Rigshospitalet .
